name: Quad Bikin
description:
3-2-1 Race! Quad Bike racing like you've never seen it before. Its fun for all ages. Your kids are going to love it, and so are you. Race around the track as your favorite animal character. Finally, a true 3D quad bike racing app for all ages and player levels.

Top Game Features:

• A fun fast, fast paced game that the whole family can enjoy.
• Race as a Hippo, Lion, Tiger, Rhino, Deer, and many more.
• Plenty of different characters to play.
• 3D Graphics are very colorful and high quality.
• 4 Courses with increasing difficulty
• Quad Bike racing like you've never seen it for mobile
• Race as your favorite Safari animal.
• Time trial and race modes.

4 Levels of Difficulty increase the challenge.
4 Track types, with huge jumps, turbo boosts, oil slicks, rocks to avoid, plenty of other special racing effects. This high action off-road game will have you playing for hours.

No two games will ever be the same. The track conditions change dynamically with each race. Attack the course with reckless abandon and find yourself victorious. A fun quad bike racing experience for your favorite mobile device.

A fun fast, fast paced game that the whole family can enjoy. 4x4 Racing has never been more fun on mobile.

Plenty of different characters to play with. Loaded with surprises!

Colorful and high quality 3D graphics. If you love ATV racing or other car driving simulators, your are going to love this game.
